entry.title: Friday: Periods of rain. High 12.
entry.summary: Cloudy. Periods of rain beginning early this morning. Risk of a thunderstorm late this afternoon. Wind south 30 km/h. High 12. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Periods of rain. Temperature steady near 10.
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending before morning then partly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers. Risk of a thunderstorm this evening. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 60. Temperature steady near 10. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of showers. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. POP 40%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 40 percent chance of showers in the morning. A few showers beginning near noon. Wind southwest 30 km/h gusting to 80 increasing to 50 gusting to 90 in the morning then becoming northwest 50 gusting to 70 in the afternoon. Temperature falling to minus 1 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM EDT Friday 31 March 2023
